tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE EventMarketingData (
    event_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    event_name VARCHAR(255),
    ticket_sales INT,
    promotional_activities VARCHAR(255),
    campaign_start_date DATE,
    campaign_end_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE campaigns (
    campaign_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    campaign_name VARCHAR,
    campaign_type VARCHAR,
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE ticket_sales (
    ticket_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    event_id INT,
    campaign_id INT,
    sale_date DATE,
    sale_amount DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE event_campaigns (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    campaign_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    start_date DATE NOT NULL,
    end_date DATE NOT NULL,
    budget DECIMAL NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE ticket_sales (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    event_campaign_id INTEGER REFERENCES event_campaigns(id),
    ticket_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    sale_date DATE NOT NULL,
    sale_amount DECIMAL NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE promotional_activities (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    event_campaign_id INTEGER REFERENCES event_campaigns(id),
    activity_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    activity_date DATE NOT NULL,
    cost DECIMAL NOT NULL
);
